${ModID}:HarmoniousVoice.NAME: Harmonious Voice
${ModID}:HarmoniousVoice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Queue a [BlockNote] or [BuffNote] , gain !M! Temporary_HP.

${ModID}:DiscordantVoice.NAME: Discordant Voice
${ModID}:DiscordantVoice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Queue a [AttackNote] or [DebuffNote] , deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:BucklerBash.NAME: Buckler Bash
${ModID}:BucklerBash.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Block. NL If you do, deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:BestowCurse.NAME: Bestow Curse
${ModID}:BestowCurse.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP at the start of each of its turns. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:FeastOnFear.NAME: Feast on Fear
${ModID}:FeastOnFear.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, gain !M! Temporary_HP instead.

${ModID}:Thunderwave.NAME: Thunderwave
${ModID}:Thunderwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SongBolt.NAME: Song Bolt
${ModID}:SongBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each ${ModID}:Note you have ${ModID}:Queued. NL Clear your Note Queue.

${ModID}:QuickSong.NAME: Quick Song
${ModID}:QuickSong.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard a card. NL ${ModID}:Queue ${ModID}:Notes as if the card was played.

${ModID}:TinyHut.NAME: Tiny Hut
${ModID}:TinyHut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card for each unique ${ModID}:Note you have ${ModID}:Queued.

${ModID}:Gamble.NAME: Gamble
${ModID}:Gamble.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card type (Attack/Skill/Power). NL Draw 1 card, if it is the chosen type, it costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:DervishDance.NAME: Dervish Dance
${ModID}:DervishDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each [AttackNote] you have ${ModID}:Queued.

${ModID}:Parry.NAME: Parry
${ModID}:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Dexterity affects this card !M! times.

${ModID}:Balestra.NAME: Balestra
${ModID}:Balestra.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL This card's damage is affected by Dexterity in addition to Strength.

${ModID}:Invisibility.NAME: Invisibility
${ModID}:Invisibility.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:M2! Intangible. NL Draw !M! more card next turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Invisibility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:M2! Intangible. NL Draw !M! more cards next turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Accelerando.NAME: Accelerando
${ModID}:Accelerando.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose [E] next turn.

${ModID}:GuardPoint.NAME: Guard Point
${ModID}:GuardPoint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have no [BlockNote] ${ModID}:Queued, gain !B! Block again.

${ModID}:InspiringSong.NAME: Inspiring Song
${ModID}:InspiringSong.DESCRIPTION: Gain ${ModID}:Inspiration !${ModID}:In! NL for each [BuffNote] you have ${ModID}:Queued.

${ModID}:Shout.NAME: Shout
${ModID}:Shout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Decrease this card's Strength loss by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:Silence.NAME: Silence
${ModID}:Silence.DESCRIPTION: Enemy cannot debuff you for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Silence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy cannot buff itself or debuff you for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Aphasia.NAME: Aphasia
${ModID}:Aphasia.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose between !${ModID}:M2! and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PrismaticSpray.NAME: Prismatic Spray
${ModID}:PrismaticSpray.DESCRIPTION: Add X random Attacks of any color into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PrismaticSpray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X random Attacks of any color into your hand. They cost 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LifeDrain.NAME: Life Drain
${ModID}:LifeDrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Temporary_HP for half the unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:MnemonicVestments.NAME: Mnemonic Vestments
${ModID}:MnemonicVestments.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Startup: Choose any card in your deck and shuffle a copy of that card into your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.
${ModID}:MnemonicVestments.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL Startup: Choose any card in your deck and shuffle a copy of that card into your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:SplendidForm.NAME: Splendid Form
${ModID}:SplendidForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of NL your turn, gain NL ${ModID}:Inspiration !${ModID}:M2!.

${ModID}:PowerWordStun.NAME: Power Word Stun
${ModID}:PowerWordStun.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has less than !${ModID}:M2! % HP, Stun it for !M! turn.

${ModID}:LingeringEcho.NAME: Lingering Echo
${ModID}:LingeringEcho.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next card you play this turn remains in your hand.

${ModID}:ReverseGravity.NAME: Reverse Gravity
${ModID}:ReverseGravity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, deal !${ModID}:M2! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies again.

${ModID}:CovetousAura.NAME: Covetous Aura
${ModID}:CovetousAura.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Strength, you also gain the same Strength.

${ModID}:EnGarde.NAME: En Garde
${ModID}:EnGarde.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Inspiration affects this card !M! times.

${ModID}:GlyphOfWarding.NAME: Glyph of Warding
${ModID}:GlyphOfWarding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose Block or Temporary_HP, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Wish.NAME: Wish
${ModID}:Wish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose any non-rare Bard card. Permanently replace this card with the chosen card. NL Purge.

${ModID}:Shifting.NAME: Shifting
${ModID}:Shifting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage or NL gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage or NL gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:MantleOfInspiration.NAME: Mantle of Inspiration
${ModID}:MantleOfInspiration.DESCRIPTION: Increase all ${ModID}:Inspiration you gain from cards by !${ModID}:M2!.

${ModID}:LocateObject.NAME: Locate Object
${ModID}:LocateObject.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL ${ModID}:Queue a ${ModID}:Rest. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:LocateObject.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL ${ModID}:Queue a ${ModID}:Rest. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:GreaterMagicWeapon.NAME: Greater Magic Weapon
${ModID}:GreaterMagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: The first Attack card you play each turn also applies !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:PhantasmalForce.NAME: Phantasmal Force
${ModID}:PhantasmalForce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL If the enemy is Weak, deal damage equal to your Temporary_HP.

${ModID}:CuttingWords.NAME: Cutting Words
${ModID}:CuttingWords.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy for each [DebuffNote] you have ${ModID}:Queued.

${ModID}:ThickOfTheFight.NAME: Thick of the Fight
${ModID}:ThickOfTheFight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each living enemy. NL Costs 1 less [E] NL for each living enemy.

${ModID}:Demoralize.NAME: Demoralize
${ModID}:Demoralize.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Weak and Vulnerable.

${ModID}:StudiedStrike.NAME: Studied Strike
${ModID}:StudiedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each NL stack of Weak or Vulnerable on the enemy.

${ModID}:TwoAndFour.NAME: 2 and 4
${ModID}:TwoAndFour.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, choose a ${ModID}:Note to ${ModID}:Queue.

${ModID}:FirstStrike.NAME: First Strike
${ModID}:FirstStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Startup: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Sift.NAME: Sift
${ModID}:Sift.DESCRIPTION: Draw !${ModID}:M2! card. NL Gain [E] equal NL to its cost.

${ModID}:Improv.NAME: Improv
${ModID}:Improv.DESCRIPTION: This turn, for every !M! ${ModID}:Notes you ${ModID}:Queue, perform any ${ModID}:Melody regardless of your Note Queue. NL At the end of this turn, clear your Note Queue.

${ModID}:DeathMetal.NAME: Death Metal
${ModID}:DeathMetal.DESCRIPTION: You can no longer ${ModID}:Queue ${ModID}:Notes. NL Whenever you would ${ModID}:Queue a ${ModID}:Note, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies instead.

${ModID}:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
${ModID}:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Choose a ${ModID}:Note to ${ModID}:Queue. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:OffKey.NAME: Off-Key
${ModID}:OffKey.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Queue !M! ${ModID}:Rests.

${ModID}:Rest.NAME: Rest
${ModID}:Rest.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Queue !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Rests. NL Heal !M! HP for each ${ModID}:Rest in your Note Queue. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MagnumOpus.NAME: Magnum Opus
${ModID}:MagnumOpus.DESCRIPTION: Gain ${ModID}:Inspiration !${ModID}:In!. NL Permanently increase this card's ${ModID}:Inspiration by !${ModID}:M2!. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Sonata.NAME: Sonata
${ModID}:Sonata.DESCRIPTION: You can perform every possible ${ModID}:Melody in your Note Queue at once.

${ModID}:FingerOfDeath.NAME: Finger of Death
${ModID}:FingerOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to twice your Temporary_HP.
${ModID}:FingerOfDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to twice your Temporary_HP to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:FalseLife.NAME: False Life
${ModID}:FalseLife.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Gain !${ModID}:M2! additional Temporary_HP for each [BlockNote] you have ${ModID}:Queued.

${ModID}:Solo.NAME: Solo
${ModID}:Solo.DESCRIPTION: If your Note Queue contains no ${ModID}:Notes, perform any ${ModID}:Melody.

${ModID}:LingeringPerformance.NAME: Lingering Performance
${ModID}:LingeringPerformance.DESCRIPTION: All ${ModID}:Inspiration you currently have affect !M! additional card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:Rhapsody.NAME: Rhapsody
${ModID}:Rhapsody.DESCRIPTION: Perform any ${ModID}:Melody you have the ${ModID}:Notes for, regardless of their order.

${ModID}:BottledSong.NAME: Bottled Song
${ModID}:BottledSong.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a potion containing the ${ModID}:Notes currently in your Note Queue. NL Exhaust.
